content:
Massive Scale Name Management: Lessons Learned from the .com Namespace
Mark Kosters, Network Solutions

Abstract:

Network Solutions (NSI) has been involved in key domain registries since 1991. During that time, NSI has developed and maintained systems to deal with the growth in domain registrations that closely mirrors the growth of the Internet. This presentation will discuss challenges with technology, customer service, and legal/political issues that have been overcome. In addition, it will point out future challenges that are ahead in dealing with a domain registry on the Internet.

TWIST 99

Irvine Research Unit in Software
Information and Computer Science
University of California, Irvine
Irvine, CA 92697-3425
